remarks: A subgraph of a hypergraph (formed by removing some edges from the original graph) is a hypergraph, analogous to ~ umgrares .  Remark:  The proof is much longer (although a lot is already covered by ~ uhgrepe ) than the proof of the corresponding theorem ~ uhgrares for graphs defined as pairs.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 27-Dec-2017.)  (Revised by AV, 18-Jan-2020.)
statement:
uhgres.e $e |- E = ( .ef ` G ) $.
uhgres $p |- ( ( G e. UHGraph /\ F = ( E |` A ) ) -> ( G sSet <. ( .ef ` ndx ) , F >. ) e. UHGraph ) $.
